about us - microlap home about us about us custom and specialty manufacturing microlap is a leading us manufacturer of high-precision industrial components made from synthetic ruby sapphire ceramic carbide and other hard materials we offer standard products or we can custom-manufacture to your exact specifications quality control strict quality controls are in effect during every phase of design and production using microscopes and highly precise measuring instruments our quality assurance specialists ensure the ultimate in product consistency serious about precision for nearly 70 years microlap was established by the federal government as the turtle mountain ordnance plant with production of jewel bearings beginning in 1952 the name was changed in 1973 to the william langer jewel bearing plant in 1996 the plant was privatized and renamed microlap technologies inc

services - microlap home services services microlap specializes in producing high-quality finished products of nearly any size or configuration to meet your specific requirements from prototype to production orders we have the capability to respond quickly while offering competitive rates microlap specializes in the following services design assistanceprototypingcuttinggrindingdrillinglappingpolishinginspectingcleaning quality controls stringent quality controls are an integral part of our manufacturing operations using microscopes and highly precise measuring instruments our quality assurance staff ensures the ultimate in product consistency quality control and calibration services: cleaning and packagingdimensional inspectionssurface finish inspectionstalyrond measurement capabilitiescomplete in-house calibration capabilitiesverification of wire and plug gage sizesmeasurement standards traceable to nist if you need a precision component that is extremely durable and requires a specific configuration microlap can custom manufacture an economical solution to meet your exact specifications request a quote

materials - microlap home materials materials microlap is a leading us manufacturer of extremely high precision industrial components made from synthetic ruby synthetic sapphire ceramic carbide and other hard materials corundum corundum is the second-hardest natural mineral yet discovered red corundum is known as ruby and all other colors of corundum are known as sapphire sapphire and ruby are durable materials with excellent optical characteristics the durability and hardness of corundum make it resistant to abrasion and damage corundum’s unique characteristics make it ideal for a wide range of applications across a variety of industries microlap’s unique mechanical manufacturing processes ensures optimum material integrity while reducing fatigue and stress typical uses for synthetic ruby and sapphire corundum: ball check valves for precision metering pumps and dispensersjewel bearingswindows for high temperature or corrosive environmentpen tipsorifice for air gas and liquid meteringpistonswater-jet cutting orifices and nozzleswire guideprobes for measuring instrumentsbearingsprobes for measuring instrumentsstylus tipsmagnetic tapes cleaning bladesair bearingsnozzle for printing headsfiber-optic lensescapillaries and collimatorschemical and medical valvesfiber-optic connectorsgage contact pointsoptical fiber slicing tipsmedical implant devicesaperture for particles countinggyroscopesrestrictorsaircraft instrumentation unique characteristics of synthetic ruby and sapphire corundum: single crystalhigh thermal conductivityzero porosityheat resistantlow friction coefficientchemical inertnesshigh polish attainablelong lifeextreme hardnesslow specific gravitywear resistanthigh refraction indexnon-magneticshock resistanthigh dielectric strenhcorrosion resistant if you need a precision component that is extremely durable resistant to corrosion chemically inert with zero porosity microlap can custom manufacture an economical solution to meet your exact specifications request a quote

ferrules - microlap home products ferrules ferrules standard ferrule types are sc fc st lc and sma other standard ferrule sizes include 158mm and 200mm od ferrules available in single-mode or multi-mode available in zirconia or alumina ceramic material high dimensional accuracy and tight tolerances offers high strenh performance and durability available with a variety of end face tip configurations custom id od lenh dimensions and tolerances available upon request custom features such as grooves notches counterbores stepped od’s vent holes etc also available upon request 125 od lc type 125 od mu type 158 od type 200 od type 25 od sc type 25 od st type 25 od apc-c type 317 od sma type

sleeves - microlap home products sleeves sleeves sleeves are available as solid or split alignment sleeves standard sleeve types are lc sc and sma other standard sizes include 158mm and 200mm id sleeves available in zirconia or alumina ceramic material high dimensional accuracy and tight tolerances offers high strenh performance and durability custom id od lenh dimensions and tolerances available upon request custom features such as grooves notches etc available upon request lc sleeve 158mm id sleeve 200mm id sleeve sc sleeve sma sleeve

custom components - microlap home products custom components custom components microlap specializes in producing high-quality custom products to each customer’s specific dimensions tolerances and finishes from prototype to production orders we have the capability to respond quickly while offering competitive prices complete the request a quote hyperlink form to send us your specific requirements and drawings

orifices/nozzles - microlap home products orifices/nozzles orifices/nozzles made from high-quality synthetic ruby and sapphire synthetic ruby and sapphire is wear-resistant temperature-resistant chemically inert and incredibly durable orifices are mechanically drilled eliminating material fatigue and stress associated with laser drilling techniques high precision control of the id and edge radius results in precise flow consistency coherent stream and excellent flow consistency typical applications are water jet cutting and cleaning nozzles ink jet nozzles air jets medical devices and valve seats custom dimensions and tolerances and surface finishes available upon request orifices/nozzles

windows/lenses - microlap home products windows/lenses windows/lenses made from high-quality optical grade synthetic sapphire available in circular square or rectangular shapes and custom sizes synthetic sapphire is wear-resistant temperature-resistant chemically inert and incredibly durable typical applications for windows include optical systems medical device equipment bar code readers infrared devices ultraviolet devices watch or camera devices custom dimensions and tolerances available upon request

jewel bearings - microlap home products jewel bearings jewel bearings jewel bearings are used in a variety of applications where durability wear-resistance low friction and/or extreme environment conditions are performance factors tight tolerances and highly polished finishes are among the greatest attributes of jewel bearings typical applications for jewel bearings include precision instrumentation devices; such as measuring instruments dial indicators watches altimeters gyros gauges compasses fluid or gas flow devices gimbals meters and many other bearing applications custom dimensions and tolerances available upon request endstone cap jewel vee jewel cup jewel bar hole ringstone bar hole ringstone bombe bar hole single cup bar hole double cup olive hole ringstone olive hole ringstone bombe olive hole single cup olive hole single cup bombe olive hole double cup ms jewel bearings

pins/rods - microlap home products pins/rods pins/rods made from high-quality synthetic ruby sapphire or ceramic synthetic ruby and sapphire is wear-resistant temperature-resistant chemically inert and incredibly durable typical applications for pins and rods include insulators medical and diagnostic devices pumps and lift pins custom dimensions and tolerances and surface finishes available upon request

balls - microlap home products balls balls made from high-quality synthetic ruby sapphire zirconia ceramic silicon nitride or glass available in grades 5 10 15 and 25 per afbma standards half balls lenses also available in synthetic ruby and sapphire typical applications are fiber optic lenses measuring stylus flow meters check valves pumps and gauges custom features such as flats blind holes or through holes also available upon request custom dimensions tolerances and surface finishes available upon request

blades - microlap home products blades blades made from high-quality synthetic ruby or sapphire synthetic ruby and sapphire is wear-resistant temperature-resistant chemically inert and incredibly durable typical applications for blades include optical fiber cutting devices and surgical knives custom dimensions and tolerances available upon request

privacy policy - microlap home privacy policy privacy policy microlap is aware that the security of your private information from the use of our website is an important concern we take the protection of your personal data very seriously and demonstrate a strong commitment to online privacy in acknowledgment of that commitment we have adopted a comprehensive policy to safeguard the privacy of all visitors to the microlap website collection of data we store data on our servers for various security reasons this data may include the name of your internet service provider click sources the websites that you visit from our site and your internet protocol ip address this information can be used to help diagnose problems with our server to administer our website to help identify you and to gather broad demographic information the data we collect will only be used for the purpose of supplying you with the requested products or services company marketing purposes or for other reasons for which you have given your consent except where otherwise provided by law security microlap uses technical and organizational security precautions to protect your data from manipulation loss destruction or access by unauthorized persons children we do not collect process or use on our website any information relating to an individual whom we know to be under 13 years old without the prior verifiable consent of his or her legal representative we do not give children the ability to post or distribute personal information without prior consent we do not entice children with games or contests that would encourage them to disclose personal information disclaimer this site contains links to other sites microlap is not responsible for the content or privacy practices of these sites contact us please contact us if you have any questions or concerns about our privacy policy

Privacy Policy - Microlap Microlap About Us Products Ferrules Sleeves Custom Components Orifices/Nozzles Windows/Lenses Jewel Bearings Pins/Rods Balls Blades Services Materials Contact Request a Quote Request a Quote Home Privacy Policy Privacy Policy Microlap is aware that the security of your private information from the use of our website is an important concern. We take the protection of your personal data very seriously and demonstrate a strong commitment to online privacy. In acknowledgment of that commitment, we have adopted a comprehensive policy to safeguard the privacy of all visitors to the Microlap website. Collection of Data We store data on our servers for various security reasons. This data may include the name of your Internet service provider, click sources, the websites that you visit from our site and your Internet Protocol (IP) address. This information can be used to help diagnose problems with our server, to administer our website, to help identify you and to gather broad demographic information. The data we collect will only be used for the purpose of supplying you with the requested products or services, company marketing purposes or for other reasons for which you have given your consent, except where otherwise provided by law. Security Microlap uses technical and organizational security precautions to protect your data from manipulation, loss, destruction or access by unauthorized persons. Children We do not collect, process or use on our website, any information relating to an individual whom we know to be under 13 years old, without the prior, verifiable consent of his or her legal representative. We do not give children the ability to post or distribute personal information without prior consent. We do not entice children with games or contests that would encourage them to disclose personal information. Disclaimer This site contains links to other sites. Microlap is not responsible for the content or privacy practices of these sites. Contact Us Please contact us if you have any questions or concerns about our privacy policy.
